import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from 'axios'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import MenuNav from "../Components/MenuNav"; import exit from '../pics/exit.svg'; import edit from '../pics/change_icon.svg'; function Me() { let { id } = useParams(); const [user, setUser] = useState(); const [page, setPage] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/users?id=${id}`).then((res) => { setUser(res.data) }); }, []); return (
{console.log(user)}}>

  • setPage('favorites')}>Избранное
  • setPage('pets')}>Питомцы
  • setPage('orders')}>Заказы

); } export default Me;
